entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
